articles.description: Despite an off day against Chelsea, Pep Guardiola insists he will not tell striker Erling Haaland how to score goals.

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen move eight points clear of Bayern Munich at the top of the Bundesliga after a narrow victory over mid-table Heidenheim.
